name: Andromeda Space 2.0
description:
My 2D Shooter Game Project. Modifications include:

  1. Expanding Level 1 extensively
  2. Designing Level 1 around the theme, "Mercury"
  3. Renamed Level 2, "Venus"
    1. Level design not yet themed around Venus. Future Release.
  4. Renamed Level 3, "Earth"
    1. Level design not yet themed around Earth. Future Release.
  5. Added Instructions
  6. Placed goal "message" on Level 1 to go away after 6 seconds.

Created by: Donald Faulknor
